Closet.name: Closet
Closet.desc: This isn't a very large or clean closet.

door: The door leads back into the room.

closet: A closet lies off to the side.
e: There is a pathway to the east.
s: There is a hallway to the south.

iron sword.name: iron sword
iron sword.desc: There is an iron sword on the ground.
iron sword.inspection: The iron sword is of crude workmanship, but it should be usable.

Next Room.name: Next Room
Next Room.desc: You are in the next room over.

w: There is a pathway to the west.

large red block.name: large red block
large red block.desc: A large red block rests on the ground.
large red block.inspection: Well... it's just a large red block.

Long Hallway.name: Long Hallway
Long Hallway.desc: You are in a long, dark hallway.

n: There is a room to the north

capsule.name: capsule
capsule.inspection: The capsule appears to be able to hold things.

curious object.name: curious object
curious object.desc: There is a curious object here.
curious object.inspection: The object's appearance confuses your weak mind.

brown leaf.name: brown leaf
brown leaf.desc: A brown leaf lies on the ground.
